actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to convey to the State of Oklahoma all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to the Fort Gibson Reservoir project, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to convey, subject to specified conditions, all interest of the United States in the Fort Gibson Reservoir project to the State of Oklahoma.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to convey to the State of Oklahoma all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to the Fort Gibson Reservoir project, and for other purposes.
